title: The Elegant Gentleman's Guide to Knife Fighting
resume: The Elegant Gentleman's Guide to Knife Fighting aspires to take sketch comedy in a different  direction. With longer-form scenes, less traditional material, and  surprising cast, it will be at times random, often ridiculous and  occasionally surreal.
